headline: Sustainable Investing Is Still Hot With Younger Investors. One Pro’s Stock Picks.
summary: Peter Krull is a staunch advocate for sustainable investing, a philosophy he’s espoused for more than two decades as a financial advisor.  Based in Asheville, N.C., Krull, 55, is a partner and the director of sustainable investing at Earth Equity Advisors.  Over his career, Krull has watched the acronyms shift from socially responsible investing (SRI) to environmental, social, and governance (ESG), and more recently, as he puts it, to sustainable, resilient, and innovation (back to SRI).

headline: Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Zacks.com users have recently been watching Applied Materials (AMAT) quite a bit. Thus, it is worth knowing the facts that could determine the stock's prospects.
